name: The Quest for the Beefy Thumb
name_original: The Quest for the Beefy Thumb
description:
Created for the Butterscotch Schenani-Jam 5/26/17 - 5/28/17

Beefy Thumbs!

(based on the theme: Ep97: Beefy Thumbs)

In a far away land, in a time long ago.....

To climb to the top of the social ladder, you must possess the highly coveted BEEFY THUMB!

Meet interesting townsfolk.... Gather items.... Complete quests.... And push yourself to your very limit.

Updated: 6/1/17 - read devlog
